SPS In Brief?

School of practical studies (SPS) helps the young Indian generation who had benefited nothing from our countrys poor education system by providing an intensive industry relevent training on the leading software technologies.

 The SPS program is completely free upfront and our students pay zero tution fee util they land a job. We believe everyone should get the right opportunities to learn, hense we do not charge any fees upfront.

 SPS is not just another training institute where you go learn something and leave forever. SPS is community and help the new buddies as a way of giving back.
Life at SPS
SPS is built on 3 principles i.e, Open Material Education, Self learning and Peer to Peer Learning.
The Ignition
Learn all the fundamentals \n of programming (0 -30 days).
The Acceleration
During this period you will dive\ndeep into various aspects of \n your domain(31-90 days).
And the Race
You will launch as many live \n projects as possible (91-180 days).

Want to join SPS?
3 step process to join the SPS
Apply Online
Submit your application online\n and Pick an interview date which is\nconvenient for you
The Interview
Appear for the telephone \n interview.Give the best and honest \nanswers you can.
Joining Mail
Get the joining mail if \nyou have qualified.
If you failed to qualify the interview, \nthen prepare well, schedule it again,\n and repeat the process until you win
Who is SPS for?

Anyone who wants to learn 
 computer Programming and 
build a good carrer as a 
software engineer.
Do I need any prior \nknowledge / experience in computer programming to join SPS?
No, you dont require any prior knowledge \n experience in computer programming.
But you must be ready to \n learn it.
Do I need a degree or\n educational qualifications?
No, you dont need any degree\n or educational qualifications
What are the eligibility \nCriteria to join SPS?
Applicant should have basic \nMathematical skills such as addition,\nSubstraction, multiplication,and division.
Ability to read and write in English.
Can I learn specific domain\nlike cyber security, datascience AI/ML etc..\n At SPS
Yes, you can choose any domain\nas you wish
We dont control what you learn
Everything is self learnt and learnt from peers.
What are the Admission \nProcedure of SPS?
1. Submit an online application on this website.
2.You will get an interview call \nfrom SPS at the date and \ntime you have picked up.
3. If you qualify the interview\nYou will get a joining date and other\nother details via mail.
4.Pay the refundable caution deposit amount and confirm\nyour seat.
How do Iprepare for the SPS\n Interview?
SPS interview consists of very basic \nprogramming questions and few \n general questions about yourself.
Can I apply again if I failed the interview?
Yes you can apply till you get qualified.
But be prepared thoroughly before you make\neach attempt.
Will I have to pay any fee upfront?
No.There are no upfront fees and you pay via \nan ISA (detailed explanation in the following Questions)once you get a job
However , we request a fully refundable deposit \n of Rs.10,000 once you get selected, to confirm your\nseat in a batch
We do this because we have limited seates in the program\nand we need to make sure someone else cannot take \naway this opportunity from you by fase confirmation.
We refund the full amount of Rs.10,000 when you complete the program.
Can I pay the tution fee upfront and Avoid ISA?
Yes, you can pay a one time fee of Rs.52,500+GST \nas a Cource fee and you dont have to sign ISA.
Are there any other Hidden Charges?
No, there no other hidden charges like admission fee, \n Exam fee, blah blah bla..
But candidates are requested to pay a small amount for \nThe infra structure facilities that you use like internet ,dedicated work space , \ncleaning and maintenance etc...,
which usually ranges between Rs.3000-4000 per month \ depends upon the SPS hub you get.
What is ISA and how does it work
An ISA or income share agreement is used for paying SPS tution once you have \ngot a job at the salary you deserve
You will pay 15% of your monthly income for a maximum cap amount of Rs. 2 Lakhs.
Since SPS does not charge any fees upfront the ISA \nmodel incentivises us to provide superior training and acces to the \nhighest paying opportunities for you
What happens if I quite the program? \n Do I still have to pay?
If you quit or do not pass the perfomance reviews\n during the program, you will not be bound by the income share \n agreement and we will go our seperate ways.
When is the security deposit not refunded?

The two scenarios where your securty deposite will not 
be refunded are,
1. If you fail to attend the fumigation period in any case
2.Getting terminated from the 6 month program due to your deliberate poor perfomance
This is the only way we can hold you accountable and stay away \n from nom serious candidate
Can I end the contract early?
Yes, If you would like to end your contract early, you can pay the\namount equivalent to the payment cap on the contract minus any payments\n already made.
Does SPS help me get a job?
We do everything we possibly can..!!
We have a full team dedicated to career Development.
They help you prepare a resume and portfolio,\npractice interviews, and even help\n you in salary negotiation
T the end of the day through, you are the\n one who needs to apply,interview and land the job.
Do I have to take the first job I am offered?
No,we dont control where you work.
Since developers tend to get raises fairely quickly, \nwe do recommend not over optimizng your job as fast as possible
Do I have to work for the same\n company for 36 months? \n Can I switch jobs?
No,its all up to you.
You can switch whenever you want
When do my ISA repayments start?
Your ISA payments start when you start earning
If you didnt get any job 6 months\nafter you complete the SPS program,the ISA automatically expires after 6 such\n deffered-payment months
What is the interest rate forr the ISA?
ISA are not loans so they have no interest
Can I attend the program online?
No,there are no online batches for SPS.
If you want to achieve something worthwhile \nin life, you must be ready to move.
Can I attend the program as part-time?
No, SPS programs are full-time
You cannot achieve anything worth while in life being\n a part-timer.
Do I need to bring my own laptop?
Yes, you should carry a laptop with a minimu requirement of\n4GB RAM ,10GB HDD,1.6GHz processor
If you dont have one try to get atleast a used one
I want to join SS.What should I do?
Click on the Apply now button and submit your application\nAll the best.
